main event: Several unidentified luminous objects were observed in the sky over Red Bluff, California on 1 August 1952.
interesting points: The objects were described as brilliantly lighted and round or disc-shaped with no running or navigation lights,The objects were observed by numerous reliable witnesses including Air Force personnel and police officers,The sighting involved objects performing unexplained maneuvers at an estimated altitude of 10,000 to 20,000 feet,One witness reported seeing a round, blurred object traveling at a high speed and at an altitude of 3,000 feet on 4 August 1952, Visibility conditions were reported as clear during the sightings.
witness description: Air Force Detachment personnel, police officers, and civilian observers.
